<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Assignments">d86858672f101110da77c886f699b6d4</macroponent><name>button_bare_7___isHidden__</name><required_translations/><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {
  if (api.item.value.shift_worker._reference.shift._reference.order_in_the_day.value > 1) {
    var prevShiftPosition = api.data.look_up_shift_position_workers.results.find(function(it) {
      // Get record with same worker, on same day, with one less 'order in the day'
      return it.shift_worker._reference.worker.value == api.item.value.shift_worker._reference.worker.value
        && new Date(it.shift_worker._reference.shift.value).getMonth() == new Date(api.item.value.shift_worker._reference.shift.value) - 1
        && new Date(it.shift_worker._reference.shift.value).getDay() == new Date(api.item.value.shift_worker._reference.shift.value).getDay() - 1
        && it.shift_worker._reference.shift._reference.order_in_the_day.value == api.item.value.shift_worker._reference.shift.order_in_the_day.value - 1;
    });
    var currShiftPosition = api.data.look_up_shift_position_workers.results.find(function(it) {
      
    });
    return '';
  } else {
    return true;
  }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-08 06:27:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>17d0dd3f2f81d510da77c886f699b6c9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>button_bare_7___isHidden__</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Eyva" source="x_802331_eyva">04928fc32fd41110da77c886f699b615</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Eyva">04928fc32fd41110da77c886f699b615</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_17d0dd3f2f81d510da77c886f699b6c9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-08-08 06:27:31</sys_updated_on><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
